subject: Nutrition
title: Drone and Robot Farming
description: Learn Drone and Robot Farming in one minute.

hook.text: Drones scan 500 acres in an hour, detecting crop disease weeks before any human eye would notice.

buildup.text: Farm robots now weed fields, pick strawberries, and spray targeted pesticide on individual plants.

discovery.text: Autonomous tractors can plow, plant, and harvest entire fields without a human operator in the cab.

twist.text: Labor shortages accelerate adoption. In Japan, the average farmer is 67 years old and nearing retirement.

climax.text: Robot farming solves labor crises but risks displacing millions of agricultural workers worldwide.

punchline.text: Robots learn to farm faster than farmers can retire.

quiz.question: What is the average age of a farmer in Japan?
